metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3734 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in markposts.php in Moodle3.0 through 3.0.3, 2.9 through 2.9.5, 2.8 through 2.8.11, 2.7 through2.7.13 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication ofusers for requests that marks forum posts as read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3734` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1').
